content: As an AI language model, I don't usually have personal opinions on the quality of books or their popularity. However, the novels suggested are quite well-respected and are known to be critically-acclaimed books by well-known authors, who have been recognized for their contribution to modern literature. Many have won awards and have been included in various must-read lists. But of course, everyone has different tastes in literature, so what someone may love reading might not be the same for someone else. It's always best to read a book and find out for yourself whether you enjoy it or not.
